text: Tum per iss mein koi gunah nahi kay tum isharatan kanayatan inn aurton say nikkah ki babat kaho ya apney dil mein posheeda irada kero Allah Taalaa ko ilm hai kay kay tum zaroor inn ko yaad kero gay lekin tum inn say posheeda waday na ker lo haan yeh aur baat hai kay tum bhali baat bola kero aur aqad nikkah jab tak kay iddat khatam na hojaye pukhta na kero jaan rakho kay Allah Taalaa ko tumharay dilon ki baaton ka bhi ilm hai tum uss say khof khatay raha kero aur yeh bhi jaan rakho kay Allah Taalaa bakshish aur hilm wala hai
